He swiveled his head to look around the bus. The girls were mostly recognizable, although many of them had changed hair color and style, and they were all wearing thick and colorful makeup, skimpy outfits that would nowhere near meet the dress code, and shoes or boots with very high heels.

"They look like strippers," he mumbled.

"What did you say?" Bill asked him.

"The girls on the bus," Luke said, more clearly. "They all look li--"

He'd spotted an SUV that pulled up next to the bus, and not only did the woman driving look like a stripper, but there were two junior strippers in the back seat. He turned his head a little bit, and saw a woman on the sidewalk walking a dog, looking like it was perfectly normal to be doing so while dressed in a halter top, microskirt, and clear plastic platform heels.

"--like strippers," Luke concluded. "All girls look like strippers."

Bill chortled. "Yeah, right. Let me know when they take their clothes off for you."

Although a jock, Luke wasn't completely brain-dead; he'd put two plus two together and connected his thought with the apparent change to the world, and figured that the cause had to be the unusual liquid he'd drunk just a few minutes earlier.

Then he realized he was getting a very good view of the generous cleavage of the platinum blonde sitting in front of him.

Luke looked up and thought of something in silence.

As she walked she couldn't help but enjoy the knowledge that everything was smaller than her. Not only was everything smaller, everything was weaker, and unable to stop her. After all she had become a Goddess, and the entire world was at her feet. As she progressed down the freeway she now flattened tractor trailers, and several cars under each step. Vehicles frantically tried driving on the shoulders of the road, and even off the road to get away from her. All these attempts failed as they just ended up as compacted steel and broken plastic in a footprint. Most of the time the tractor trailers burst into flame as Alyssa's foot crushed them out of existence. She had unknowingly began playing a game with herself. She tried to place her feet where they would crush the most cars. She then tried just stepping on the tractor trailers, giggling at the effects they had on everything around them as they met their doom.

Alyssa was enjoying her game so much, that before she knew it she was in the state capital. She paused and looked around at everything before her. Alyssa was a bit disappointed she was hoping the capital would have more to it, but it only had a few skyscrapers. Only a few stood out from the rest, around 10 she guessed that were taller than the others, at around 500 or so feet tall. All the other smaller buildings where between 5 to 10 stories tall, not even up to her knees.

"Well lets see what kinda of damage I can cause at THIS size!" with that Alyssa raised her foot and placed it down on top of one of the smaller buildings. It was about 100 feet tall, a little less than her foot length in height. Slowly Alyssa applied pressure to the building, she could feel it start to crack and give way under her effort. Alyssa was focusing hard on not applying too much pressure so the building wouldn't simply crumble, she wanted to enjoy this. The upper floors gave way first as her foot broke through them, stone and steel rained down on the people in the streets below. A bit more effort and she pierced the next level, then she applied more pressure, another floor gave way, then another, and another. It was just like she imagined, just like crushing a doll house, except it was more detailed, and even more fragile than she could have imagined. Finally Alyssa's foot reached the bottom floor, and the rest of the building collapsed around her foot covering it in debris.

"My first skyscraper, I expected a bit more resistance than that, perhaps it was just poorly built..." she then lifted her foot up out of the ruble, and placed it over another small building of the same size.

This time she stomped down on it with all her might. Alyssa's foot ripped through floor after floor like it was made of thin cardboard. In a single stomp she had leveled that building, and didn't even really try to destroy it.

"This is really too easy..." she said raising her foot up and repeating the process again. "Everything is too small and weak, buildings break with the smallest effort..." she then poked the lower floors of a building with her toe causing a huge chuck to collapse. People began pouring out of the buildings in a desprite attempt to get away. Alyssa simply sweeped her foot around, plowing it through dozens of buildings all of which fell over and collapsed. "All you people do is run around and scream, why don't you all just shut up!" she said stomping down on a mass of people fleeing the scene. "Why don't you all just sit down, shut up, and worship me like the worthless insects that you are?". Alyssa then kicked another building over on top a group of running people, destroying both the building and them. "Seriously what use do you insects have for me?" she then scooped up a couple people from a group and placed them in the palm of her hand.

"You are too small to hurt me, all you do is make noise... I doubt you could please me... So I wonder, do you have any flavor?" Alyssa popped them in her mouth and chewed them some. Quickly she made a face of disgust and spit the people out at her feet. "You people taste horrible!" raising her foot up she stomped their remains and twisted the ball of her foot to grind them into the ground good. "It seems your buildings are the only thing interesting to me at the moment, so lets taste one of them..." Walking over she grabbed the base of a building and ripped it from it's foundation. Her eyebrows raised with interest at her strength. Bringing the building up to her mouth she licked the outside of it, her expression turned to one of disappointment. "I can't say I expected a building to taste good, but it's still better than those insects..." Alyssa stomped her foot down on another group of people to make her point. Focusing back on the toy in her hand she brought it up to her mouth and took a bite of the roof and side. She could make out the flavor of the building, the people, and other things inside. Together the flavors mashed together and actually seemed to be enjoyable. "Not too bad, I could get used to it if I had to, but I expect my worshipers to bring me only the finest foods!" Alyssa then dropped the building on top of several others and made her way over to the larger skyscrapers.

Alyssa looked at the buildings that were only about waist high to her, and pondered what to do with them.

The first one she straddled between her thighs and squeezed them together. The building exploded in a cloud of dust and debris that rained down over the city. Alyssa giggled at her work, and began wiping the dust off her skirt and legs. She then eyed a second building of the same size close to her. Balling up her fist she plowed her hand through the top of the building and didn't stop until it was all the way to the ground floor, cutting through the building like it was butter. A massive cloud of dust erupted from the building covering her face and top.

Alyssa coughed at the dust, and began brushing it off. "That was fun, but perhaps a bit too messy..." she snapped her fingers and the dust was gone from her face and hair. "Then again... does it really matter?!" she laughed looking at a grouping of the buildings with an evil grin. Alyssa then gave a running dive toward the buildings with her arms spread open. "GODDESS BALL!" she shouted as she collided with the buildings, pulverizing them to dust. The resounding quake from her impact collapsed dozens more buildings around her. She was coated head to toe in the gray dust as she sat back up laughing hysterically at the damage she caused.

Alyssa crossed her legs Indian style and leaned back, wondering what to do next. She idly started crushing people one by one with her fingertips, walking them up and down the streets like they were giants themselves.

She could get bigger and crush the remains of the city in a single action, she could sit and wait for the military to come and have fun with them, she could just play with her little toys, or she could... enjoy herself.

Ultimately it was a decision between pleasure and destruction.

"No, Goddess," chorused the room.

"Good. Now die." Bodies were torn to shreds as Amanda looked about. The CEO dropped dead as every disease known to humans impacted his exposed innards at once, while the CFO burned to ashes. Finally there was nothing left.

"Bah," said Amanda. "This whole fucking company can go straight to hell." She clenched Her fist, and the building began to compress in upon itself. Space warped as the building flowed into Her fist, until finally She was left standing on nothing, ignoring meaningless gravitational forces, and with a final twist of Her wrist the building and all who were inside it ceased to exist.

"Good riddance," She said to Herself. She surveyed the city.
142212211.title: A Goddess's punishment

choices: Her good for nothing cheating boyfriend
The local police that once arrested her
1422122111.content:
She thought of more revenge, more targets for her wrath. She teleported to a hamburger joint that served her burger cold yesterday and refused to give her a refund. She eyed the man at the counter "I want to see the manager at once!" The man went to the back and the manager came out "You again! Ma'am I have already explained to you there will be no refunds and-"

"SILENCE!" Her voice thundered outwards causing everyone to stare at her in silence "I am your Goddess and this is MY universe! Your cold burgers are a disgrace and I will eradicate you and everyone here from existence!" Some of the people in the shop continued to stare at her silently while others burst out into laughter. "YOU DARE LAUGH AT YOUR GODDESS? BURN!"

Everyone who laughed at her suddenly found themselves on fire, they screamed in excruciating pain and turned into ashes. Panic broke out as people tried to rush outside but the Goddess would have none of that as she sealed all the exits. "NOW YOU WILL ALL BOW AND WORSHIP ME!" Nearly everyone complied immediately by falling to their knees.

Only two remained defiant, Amanda instantly punished them by throwing two enormous weights on their backs and then freezing them both in ice. She then teleported her worshippers outside the building while the entire hamburger joint exploded in a mushroom cloud. She turned to her new worshippers. "Go forth and spread my word or you will all be destroyed like the rest of the trash"

She now turned to a new target
1422122111.title: Collective Punishment

14221221112.content:
It hadn't been too long ago that the local police had arrested Her for some petty violation of an unimportant local law. She was forced to endure the indignity at the time, but now, having realized Her destiny, could repay them in kind.

She appeared in the police station.

Rapidly scanning the officers, She found the one who had made the arrest.

"You!" She said, indicating him. "You dared to arrest your rightful Goddess. This crime is punishable by death." She gave him a painful, debilitating, terminal illness, then shoved him into a pocket dimension. It would take him millennia to die.

"What have you done?" demanded the chief of police. "Who do you think you are? You can't punish us for doing our jobs!"

"Silence, you insolent fool!" She roared. "I am your Goddess, and if you were to have a job, it would be to enforce My will. Therefore you have no job, for I can enforce My will on the whole Universe more easily than you can lift your little finger. You are irrelevant in My creation."

The Goddess theatrically swept Her hand about, and every police officer in the city, all of whom She had ensured were present, merged with the officer next to him, until there was only one grotesque creature facing the Goddess, held motionless by Her power. She teleported outside.

"Now witness all ye people, the results of My rightful justice on this den of iniquity!"

In an instant the entire building and everything inside it, people, air, and all else, turned to marble. Under Her will, it reshaped itself into a statue of Her, which then grew until it overtopped every building made by humans. She caused a copy to materialize in every major city on the planet.
14221221112.title: Everyone's  a criminal

choices: Amanda 'introduces' herself to the world via the media..
Amanda goes to an army base..
142212211121.content:
Looking around, Amanda couldnt help but notice that not everyone in the current city she was in was;

a) worshipping her

or b) staring in awe at her statue

This being completely unacceptable to her resulting in a quick conclusion that everyone in said buildings would die... painfully.

Glancing towards the closest one, Amanda narrowed her eyes and fired a beam of what could only be described as.. death.

The stone of the high rise building turned to dust, the metal to shards, and the people screamed as their souls were literally torn to bits whilst their bodies exploded in gory masses.

Laughing Amanda projected her voice across the city ''Hear ye, hear ye, I've noticed who, and who hasnt been worshipping my perfection.. and now.. paybacks a bitch.. called me..''

Moving superfast Amanda started running around the city wiping out about 50% of the population in a multitude of ways.

One building she ran through each person, literally. Another she slowly crushed peoples heads between her 2 index fingers.

Perhaps the most sadistic (in her mind) was the block of flats where everyone become supermen and women.. and whom found their new powers and invulnerability woefully inadequate vs their Goddess. Lasers, fire, ice, strength to destroy the entire planet with a gentle punch.. all proved not only ineffective, but made Amanda more and more hysterical.

Within the space of 15 minutes Amanda completed her aims.. and then, alighting on top of her statue.. she glared across the landscape in search for what to do next..
142212211121.title: She continues to destroy buildings

choices: Amanda reveals herself to the world
1422122111212.content:
Looking out, Amanda found a large army base not too far from where She was--not that any place in the universe was very far from Her. She vanished from the top of Her statue and reappeared near the base.

Walking up to it, a soldier called for Her to halt. She ignored him and continued walking. She heard every bit of radio chatter as he was eventually given permission to fire on Her. Allowing the futile attempt for a few seconds because it amused Her, She then sent a blast of pure oblivion in his direction, destroying the matter of which he was made.

The base was guarded by an electrifiable fence, which shorted out at Her touch, and She walked directly through it. A car came out to meet Her; even from a distance She could tell that they had sent only a captain to meet Her.

"Okay, miss," said the captain, "you just turn around now and there'll be no trouble, okay?"

"KNEEL."

"I said, just turn around and leave and there'll be no trouble."

"I SAID, KNEEL."

The captain levelled his gun at Her. She erased it, and those being pointed at Her from various other directions, from reality.

"Okay, miss, I don't know who you are, but--"

"No, you do not know who I am," said Amanda. "I am the Goddess of this Universe. Serve me unconditionally or be as if you never were."

"Excuse me, what?" said the captain, military bearing lost.

"I should have thought that was simple," She said. "You have two choices: unconditional service or unconditional erasure."

"I... don't see what you mean."

"Foolish impotent mortal." Amanda erased from reality one of the seven snipers who'd had their rifles trained on Her, but left the memory of his existence in the mind of the captain.

"Now, how many snipers do you have on me?"

"Seven. No, six! Seven! Six! Seven, or six? Six or seven? I don't know!"

Leaving the captain to work out the irreconcilable dissonance in his memories, Amanda walked further into the base.

She got quite far, in fact, until She was again faced with resistance. This time, She noted with a bit of approval, she rated a full colonel with detachment.

"Okay, miss, that's far--"

"Take Me to the general."

"Excuse me? I said that's--"

"What you said is irrelevant. Take Me to the general."

"I'm sorry, I can't do that."

"Of course you can. You know where his office is, how to get there, that he's in right now. You could take Me there easily."

"Sorry, miss, I have orders to escort you off this base, peacefully if possible and by force if necessary--and how do you know that he's in?"

"Never mind that," and the colonel no longer cared. "Take Me to him. Now." She put as much force as She could behind the last word without using Her power--which was still quite a lot.

The colonel wavered for a second. "I'm sorry, but I must do what I must do." He signalled his men to aim.

"Oh, please," said Amanda, and with a wave of Her hand variously burned, froze, electrocuted, drowned, garrotted, hanged, crushed and generally killed the soldiers.

The colonel looked on in shock. "Who are you?"

"Someone you will take to see your general, peacefully if possible or by force if necessary."

Having seen Her display of power, the colonel decided that he didn't want to know what She would do to him if he refused. "This way," he said, and walked off.

Amanda, knowing exactly where to go, followed him nonetheless.

The colonel rapped on an office door. "General, sir! I have the intruder. She demands to speak with you."

The general opened his door. "Why should I want to speak with her? Surely you can handle this."

"Well, sir, she wiped out everyone you sent with me with a wave of her hand..." He tailed off as he saw Amanda sitting comfortably in the general's chair.

"Okay, lady, this is too far," said the general. "You can't just barge in here and--"

"No," She said. "You cannot just barge into My Universe and expect anything to happen by your will. Observe," and the general and colonel felt themselves compelled toward a window overlooking the base's parade grounds. Every other person on the base had gathered there, along with every military machine.

"I am the beginning and the end, the alpha and the omega. All exists because I allow it, and without my consent nothing can exist."

Huge fireballs rained from the sky, and water poured as it never had before, feeding rather than extinguishing the flames. Lightning bolts struck the machines. The ground heaved. When Amanda was finished, only one live soldier remained.

"I withdraw that consent."

The soldier simply vanished.

The general stood defiant. "You'll never conquer us, you bitch. I don't care how powerful you are, we'll--"

"We'll what?" She mocked. "You'll nothing. You are nothing. You are irrelevant." She vanished.

Reappearing outside the army base again, She lifted Her arms, spread them wide, then brought Her hands together in a thunderous clap. The base vanished.
1422122111212.title: Might makes right

choices: Amanda decides to obliterate a nation or two for the hell of it..
Amanda introduces herself to the world media..
14221221112122.content:
Grinning at her handiwork, and how easily she'd casually wiped out an entire military base, Amanda thought she'd try something a little 'god like' before truely unveiling herself to the world.

Teleporting to Europe, Amanda gazed down upon the mediterranean sea. Pursing her lips she mummered 'just a little test' before warping in as many mountains from the himalayas as necessary to seal the entrance to the sea. Then floating down until she stood on the seabed, she puckered her lips and with a gentle gulp the whole sea, all 2,500,000 km's worth of water, began an insanely rapid (scientists estimate close to 2000km/millisecond) transit down to her stomach.

As the water surged into her petite form, various objects collided off her body, sharks, squid, nuclear submarines.. all shrugged off without even a bat of an eyelid.

As the last of the water slid into her she glanced over the now barren wasteland she'd created before turning her attention to the various submarines and vessels littered around her.

Strutting casually up to one submarine (walking through several sharks and even a giant squid) Amanda put her lips to the hull, then spat back out several hundred tonnes of water in a matter of milliseconds, crushing everyone inside instantly and causing the metal to heave and then explode violently as the nuclear warheads inside were set off by the pressure.

As the radioactive inferno engulfed her Amanda casually struck a pose and sent an image of herself in the raging firestorm to every media outlet, and every leader in the world.

Then, giggling to herself Amanda flew up 10 miles high and looked for what to do next..
14221221112122.title: Amanda depletes an ocean

choices: Amanda introduces herself properly through the media
Amanda rearranges the world's tectonic plates
142212211121221.content:
Having swallowed an entire sea, Amanda decided to restore it to its place, but completely anoxic.

The entire Mediterranean Sea gushed from Her, deprived of all its oxygen. She restored the mountains to their place, but left a barrier preventing any sort of water exchange, and another infinitesimal part of Her power ensured that any precipitation would not change the condition of the sea.

Casting out Her mind, She decided to demonstrate her power by obliterating a few countries. She decided on a few islands: Japan and Iceland.

Vanishing from the Mediterranean, She reappeared above Iceland. Immediately fire and lightning rained down on the doomed island.

Its cities were devastated. Akureyri was razed to the ground. Precision lightning strikes electrocuted every single person in Hafnarfjörður. Kópavogur She encased in unbreakable ice that could never melt except under Her power.

In Reykjavík She created overlapping copies of the city, one for each inhabitant, each populated by that one person, and in each She made that person's worst nightmare come to life. Laughing while they died of terror, she personally executed all the remaining inhabitants of the nation.

Finally, the island was completely depopulated. She had allowed word of the obliteration to seep out, and had destroyed all rescuers sent.

Alighting on the barren land, She lifted Her hands, and it tore away from the ocean floor. Gaining speed, it travelled through the atmosphere and plunged toward the sun, where it vanished in the nuclear inferno.

Amanda came out the other side absolutely unscathed, and proceeded to Japan.

She used no theatrics there, no varied demonstrations of power. She simply caused the entire population to form one long line, at the end of which She greeted each person before executing them bloodily. She then caused everyone of Japanese or Ainu descent, however distant, to appear before Her, and did the same.

Having erased the Japanese from the world, She caused the islands that comprised the nation to shatter into tiny pieces, and littered the Pacific Ocean with them.

As She had done with the Mediterranean, She caused footage of Her destruction of the two nations to appear as breaking news on every media outlet in the world. The only sounds to be heard were Her voice speaking twice, before the destruction of each nation, saying, "I never liked you."
142212211121221.title: I never liked you

choices: Exactly match the geo-political borders of countries
The Earth should become a Jigsaw puzzle for her amusement!
1422122111212212.content:
Having just "fired" two sovereign nations literally off the face of the Earth just because she didn't like them (for whatever reason), Amanda now turned her attention towards altering the geography of the world further. She decided to start by rearranging the planet's Tectonic plates. Amanda was always a bit obsessive compulsive when it came to things being neat and orderly, and this was how she ran things at her old company. In her new promotion to goddess of the universe she intended to carry on this policy.

Amanda decided instead of the Tectonic plates being odd random shapes and sizes they should instead be altered to...
1422122111212212.title: Amanda rearranges the world's tectonic plates

choices: Create some new countries from her own imagination
Wipe more countries off the face of her world
14221221112122121.content:
Amanda decided it would be best if the Tectonic boundaries and political boundaries of the world were one and the same, and since she was the Goddess of the universe this decision was instantly made reality. All over the world deadly fault lines such as the San Andreas fault vanished, but hundreds if not thousands of new fault lines appeared on the borders of every country (except for Iceland and Japan, both of which no longer existed).

Earthquakes now began to occur frequently and even in places where such things were once unheard of as the borders of countries rubbed and collided against one another as if WW3 were being fought geologically. As one might expect, larger countries such as Russia had the upperhand since their tectonic plates were larger and could bully the smaller countries with violent earthquakes which hit tiny countries like the Baltic states badly. In some places new volcanos began to emerge as some countries began to be subducted underneath larger countries. In other areas new mountains began to form as countries smashed into one another, forcing the land around their borders into higher altitudes.

All over the world, the cities of small countries lay in ruins, while those of larger countries remained mostly intact. Millions were already dead, and more would follow in the days and weeks to come due to lack of infrastructure and supplies. Many countries which had no prior history of earthquakes tended to be the most severally hit, as they had no experience handling such disasters. Japan would have been perhaps the most well prepared, but it no longer existed.

Amanda looked over the world and was very pleased with her handiwork. The casualties numbered in the millions, but this was a small price to pay in order to make things more neat and orderly to satisfy her obsessive compulsiveness. While some goddesses may have been satisfied and stopped right there, Amanda was more than eager to meddle and micromanage the lives of her mortal subjects. She now decides to...
14221221112122121.title: Exactly match the geo-political borders of coun...

choices: Amanda expands humanity, in an orderly fashion, to other worlds.
Amanda orders another species to Her specifications.
142212211121221211.content:
Having rearranged the world, Amanda decided that it was not yet orderly enough suit Her. To that end, She set about rearranging it further.

Every federal state found itself broken up into smaller countries--states, provinces, or other such subdivisions each became their own country, with fault lines to dictate this. More disasters ensued, and under Her power, these reduced the world's population to precisely five billion humans, exactly half male and half female.

Temporarily halting all births and deaths, Amanda surveyed every single human on Earth, finding out first and last names. If any two people had the same name, She changed one of them, until every human had a distinct name. If any lacked two names, She gave them a second.

She then destroyed every city, however small, and created ten thousand of Her own design. She broke up the world's population by last name, ordered alphabetically, and placed them into Her new cities, each of which had a population of half a million humans. Families were broken up, as each residence in Her new cities contained four humans, again ordered alphabetically. She did not care who ended up in which house; what mattered to Her was the complete orderliness of Her universe, starting with the planet where She ascended. She had made sure that when She altered names, it would work out so that each of Her cities would have a quarter of a million males and a quarter of a million females, and so that each residence would contain at least one responsible adult at all times.

In each city there was a fixed number of humans in each relevant profession, and each was self-sufficient and, except for its inhabitants, identical.

Each was ruled over by a manifestation of Her, serving as the only political and judicial authority in the city. There was no need for lawyers, as She knew the exact facts of any case. She did not care what people had been before Her rearrangement; She simply decided who would be a farmer, who a salesperson, and so on. She decided which students would study which subjects, how many would drop out of high school at which times, how many would go to university, or graduate school, and how many would become professors. In each city there was a single school, covering everything from preschool to graduate studies, and employing any postdoctoral fellows and professors it produced.

In each city She equalized birth and death rates, so that the population of any city was held constant, and as She would not suffer having anything other than the five billion names She had chosen, each child born had the name of the person who died at the same time as the birth. She did not care about the emotional trauma this caused, nor did She care that She took newborn children away from their parents immediately upon birth. Her world was ordered to her desires, and that was all that mattered to Her. She even made it so that the timing of births and deaths was constant across Her cities, so that whenever She decided it was time for someone to die and another to be born, ten thousand people would die and another ten thousand would be born.

She chose the genes of every child born--She did not care about those She had decided would not be brought to term, or would be stillborn--and enforced strict distributions of every attribute, and those distributions were the same across all cities, so that in time, except for the names, every city was identical to every other in every respect.

Travel between cities was limited, and any person who wished to do so had to apply to Her for a visa. She always ensured that whenever some number of people desired to travel from one city to another, the same number of people would simultaneously desire to travel from the second city to the first, and that they would pass each other at precisely the halfway point between the two cities.

And She looked upon Her creation, and She declared it good.
142212211121221211.title: To Her satisfaction

choices: Amanda messes with another Earth species
Amanda pays a visit to an alien world
1422122111212212112.content:
Although many would not have approve of her methods, Amanda had successfully eradicated war and crime and many other negative aspects of human behavior, and at the same time had made the world a more uniform and orderly place which now operated at clockwork efficiency, much as she had done (or tried to do) when she was the boss at the research facility which had created the potion which gave her omnipotence.

Satisfied that humanity would be fine without her supervision for a few minutes, she decided it was now time to micromanage another species to her specifications. On the one hand, Earth contained millions of other species besides humans. For example, she could mess with a species of bacteria and give it sentience and the tools necessary to develop into microscopic civilizations, or she could take something as large as an elephant and give it wings and the power to fly, or other stupid crazy things like that. The possibilities were pretty much endless.

On the other hand, Earth was far from the only planet in the universe with life on it. Perhaps it was time for a little Xeno tampering?
1422122111212212112.title: Amanda orders another species to Her specificat...

choices: Amanda respectfully requests an audience with the Queen
Amanda bypasses the guards and appears directly in the throne room
14221221112122121122.content:
Meanwhile, on a remote world in a distant galaxy an insect-like race known as the Korinthe have been living an orderly and efficient existence much in a similar manner to that Amanda had just brought to the Earth. She decided to pay these distant insectoids a visit to see how well it measured up to her organization of Humanity.

The Korinthe were similar to insects on Earth, except they were each 7ft tall sentient bipeds. The Korinthe homeworld was a low gravity world with a rich oxygen atmosphere. The entire planet was one enormous city, or hive, covered with swarms of billions upon billions of Korinthe who lived and worked on this planet which had been transformed from a normal planet into a honeycomb like sphere.

Thousands of years ago the Korinthe had mastered space travel, and were already well on their way to converting the remainder of the planets and asteroids in their star system in a similar fashion. Fortunately for any other life in this galaxy, the Korinthe had not yet mastered the secret of faster than light travel, so for the most part there was little danger of them swarming an already inhabited world.

The entire Korinthe species was controlled by a massive tyrannical Queen who was about 100ft tall and dwelt in a throne room deep in the core of the honeycomb Korinthe homeworld. At one time in the distant past there were other Queens, but over the course of centuries of brutal warfare one Queen and her faction have managed to come out on top, and after exterminating all the other factions this Queen and her dynasty was now the unquestioned supreme rulers of the entire Korinthe race.

Even though this Korinthe Queen did not have omnipotence like she did, Amanda viewed her as an equal of sorts. In a way, Amanda had become the Queen of the Homo Sapien species, so Amanda decided she would pay the Korinthe Queen a visit as one Queen to another.
14221221112122121122.title: Amanda pays a visit to an alien world

choices: A deal is reached and Amanda leaves for now.
An impasse is reached and Amanda deposes Krystlka.
142212211121221211222.content:
In one sense, one that was not particularly important, Amanda and the Korinthe Queen were equals.

In every sense that mattered, the Korinthe Queen was nothing.

Amanda had no intention of going through any formalities in order to see the Queen. She would demonstrate Her power by interrupting the Queen's largest daily audience.

Dressing Herself in a severe formal dress, She made Herself of a height with the Queen, then appeared in the Queen's throne room, banishing to oblivion everyone else there.

The Queen, of course, did not speak any language Amanda spoke before Her ascent--though She now understood all forms of communication--and Amanda would not lower Herself to speak the language of the Korinthe. Instead, She provided translation through Her power, making it seem as if She was speaking the Korinthe tongue, even making Herself appear to do so.

Before the Queen could recover from the shock of seeing her petitioners vanish and this impetuous being appear, Amanda spoke.

"Greetings from Earth, Krystlka. I am Amanda, its ruler. I come to you in order that we might discuss a mutually beneficial arrangement between our species." Amanda, of course, had no intention of doing any such thing. As soon as She felt the time was right, She would depose Krystlka and take over the rule of the Korinthe directly, and make the then-former Queen look like a saint compared to Her. The bloody way in which Krystlka's line had come to power meant they had to be at least somewhat despotic in order to maintain power, and Krystlka was one of the worst.

Queen Krystlka, meanwhile, was outraged. This... thing... appeared in her throne room--her inviolate sanctuary!--apparently caused her most favoured nobles to disappear, dared to be as large as her, addressed her by name and claimed some sort of equality through her rule of a planet of which Krystlka knew nothing? Still, the Queen was wary. The power this being had shown already was enough to give her pause. "I greet you, Amanda of Earth. I too hope that we can come to such an arrangement."

The two continued their diplomatic dance, the Queen drawing on all her savvy, training and experience, Amanda using Her omnipotence to anticipate everything Krystlka might say and prepare the perfect response.
142212211121221211222.title: A Goddess makes Her own audiences

choices: Her mouth begins to water, and she treats herself to this delicacy
Amanda feels pity, and decides to help them somehow
1422122111212212112221.content:
Never in her lifetime had Krystlka encountered a being as large and powerful enough as herself to be considered an equal. In fact, the last time such diplomacy between equal parties had occurred on the planet Korinthe was in the distant past before it had been united under one ruler. Aside from the Korinthe homeworld, there was one other planet within their solar system which was habitable, and was the home of a tiny mammalian like species known as the Volar. But the Korinthe did not view this species as equals, and upon their arrival the Korinthe exterminated and enslaved the entire Volar species and immediately annexed and began the colonization of their planet. Until today, they had been the only other sentient species the Korinthe had encountered.

Nearby the Queen's enormous throne was an enormous gilded and bejeweled pedestal, and upon this pedestal was a large beautifully crafted container filled with dozens of squirming shrieking beings, which Amanda immediately knew were members of the Volar race which had been specifically bred and handpicked as a living delicacy to the 100ft Queen. Krystlka reached her large appendage into the container and daintily grabbed up a handful of the screaming Volar which she then raised to her awaiting maw. With a tilt of her head she tossed the hapless beings inside and slowly ripped them apart with her powerful mandibles. After a few chews the screaming within her mouth ceased, and Krystlka swallowed the gorey lump down into her abdomen to be digested and converted into nectar and waste.

"These Volar are the most delicious delicacy on our world!" buzzed the queen. "But they are rare, and reserved only for royalty, but since you are such an honored guest, I invite you to help yourself to try some."

Amanda looked into the prison at the mass of squirming pleading sentient lifeforms, and...
1422122111212212112221.title: A deal is reached and Amanda leaves for now.

14222.content: The Boss encountered nobody in the hallways as she finally got in the car and drove away. For a while she simply drove down the streets, occasionally touching her jacket to verify the formula was still there. When she got out onto the highway she found herself in a massive peak hour traffic jam. Tapping the steering wheel in frustration she considered what to do, she could have the formula now and stomp on all this traffic easily or just wait it out and get home before the fun starts.
14222.title: She gets to the car

142221.content: Why bother waiting anyway? She would be a Goddess now and get home in record time, or perhaps as a Goddess she wouldn't even need a home. She took the formula from her jacket and drank it all down, after a few seconds she felt an incredible surge of power as the formula took effect, it was then she realised that she was capable of doing anything, instantly she scanned the full extent of the traffic in front of her, "It would have taken hours to clear through all this" she thought to herself, scanning further she discovered that her own boyfriend was somewhere in the traffic, only a few car rows in front of her.
142221.title: Use it now

1422211.content:
Discarding her jacket, she gets out of the car. Standing outside of it she decides to employ the ultimate security system, she shrinks her own car down to the size of a matchbox and puts it in her bra. "Now let's see anyone steal my car" she thought mischievously, none of the drivers appeared to notice except the one just behind her but she didn't care. The Goddess now walked up to her boyfriend's car and tapped on the window. Lowering down the window he said, somewhat surprised "Hey babe what are you doing out here?"

"Oh just being a Goddess and all. Hey watch this" she said, backing away from the car slightly and winking at him she holds out her hands and
1422211.title: She pays him a visit

14222112.content: Just like her you were stuck in endless traffic, but you thought she went mad when she tapped on your window and announced that she was a Goddess, when you were about to leave the car and go after her you saw that clearly she wasn't delusional as she started expanding in size dramatically. Holding out her arms as her body expanded dramatically, the cars all around began to make a commotion as they saw her expanding form and her growing mass began to strain the highway supports, sensing this she stepped off the highway but still kept growing, when she stopped expanding she was
14222112.title: She starts to grow

142221121.content:
When you looked up you saw that she finally stopped growing, she was standing about 200 feet high, just large enough for the highway to come up to her waist. Smiling mischievously her hand descended and you frantically tried to move the car but you were lifted up by her overwhelmingly powerful grip and brought up to her face. "WELCOME TO THE WILDEST RIDE IN THE WORLD. WATCH WHILE I HAVE SOME FUN"

With that she placed your car
142221121.title: 200 feet tall

1422211212.content:
Smiling mischievously the engine of your car abruptly died, extinguished by her reality altering power, feeling the frame of the car buckle from the tightening of her grip you watched as you were pulled down lower and were plunged into darkness as you realised you were wedged inside her bra, you could feel the buckling and strain as she started walking, after ten minutes of jostling in the darkness you felt yourself being lifted out into the light. You watched as your car was placed in a grassy area, looking up at her you saw that somehow she had changed, she was now wearing a miniskirt with a tank top.

You watched as she faced you and then after holding her hands out suddenly started growing, her 200 foot stature exploding to over a mile high within only seconds, hearing her deafening laughter you felt an enormous earthquake as she started walking. 14311.content:
"First Lieutenant Smith, reporting as ordered, sir!"

"At ease, Lieutenant," said the General in charge of the operation. "You have been briefed on Operation Apotheosis?"

"Yes, sir."

"Then you know what we expect to happen?"

"Yes, sir. I will become all-powerful, sir."

"And you know what will be expected of you?"

"Yes, sir. I will be expected to serve my country to the best of my abilities, sir."

"And you know why you have been chosen for this duty?"

"Yes, sir. I was instrumental in catching a foreign spy, sir."

"Good. Now, if you'll sit down." The General gestured to a chair. Lt. Smith sat down and was strapped in. "Just in case something goes wrong."

An IV drip was inserted into Lt. Smith's arm, and the small vial with the strange formula began to drain into her.

In seconds a blinding light began to glow around the lieutenant. The officers, scientists and medical staff present averted their heads and shielded their eyes. Suddenly a voice, more forceful and commanding than any they had ever heard, came from the centre of the circle they formed.

"Atten-tion!"

All of them snapped upright and turned around to see Lt. Smith standing there, with no sign of the chair, IV drip, vial or formula.

"Lieutenant Sm--" began the General.

"That's Goddess to you."

"What?"

"'What, Goddess.'" She snapped the words and the others felt them as if they were a physical lash.

"Goddess?"

"That's right."

"Goddess?"

"Yes, Mike, I'm a Goddess now."

"So Operation Apotheosis was a success... Goddess?"

"Operation Apotheosis? Don't you get it? That never happened! Did you honestly not realize what it would mean for someone to become all-powerful?"

"Goddess?"

"Yes, I'm a Goddess. The Goddess. The creator and the destroyer. The alpha and the omega. I always have been and always will be. I created this universe, and the one before it, and the one before it. I'll destroy this one and create another, destroy it and create another. So has it gone and so will it ever go."

"But your coun--"

"My country? Your country! It's nothing, meaningless! I could erase it from existence, prevent it from ever having been, at My whim! Any oaths you may think I took never happened. Don't you get it? Don't you understand? Are you all truly that limited? I am."

"But your pro--"

"My profile? That meaningless piece of junk some half-wit crackpot psychologist threw together? 'Obedient to her superiors.' Irrelevant, I have no superiors. 'Firm but fair to her subordinates.' I am fair: I'm not destroying you for daring to question Me. 'Personality known to be playful.' Well, all of reality is my plaything now, so yes, I will be playful, and I'll do whatever I want with my toys. After all, for Me, it's all just fun and games."

The Goddess knew what would happen next, but She allowed it to proceed as it amused Her. The General pushed a button on a box at his side. A klaxon blared and every human in the room dove for cover. An entire wall swiftly retracted, revealing a line of expert marksmen armed with top-of-the-line, fully automatic guns.

They opened fire.

As the hail of bullets proceeded toward the Goddess, they seemed to slow. She raised Her hand, though it was unnecessary, and the humans gaped in amazement at the fact that the deadly slugs hung in midair, immobile.

Sweeping Her hand in a clutching gesture, the guns flew out of the soldiers' hands and combined with the bullets to make a ball of metal. Swiftly crushing it with Her bare hands until it was the size of a baseball, She tossed it, created a bat out of nothing with which to swing, and at the point where the bat connected with the impromptu ball, both vanished. The soldiers, at a loss, charged toward Her, but ran into an invisible barrier and fell to the floor clutching broken bones.

"What happened, Goddess?" said one of the scientists.

"I erased them from reality. The bat I created, of course."

"What do you mean, Goddess?"

"Do I have to step you through it? I created the matter for the bat and formed it into one. Then I destroyed the matter comprising the bat and the ball."

"So where did the energy go, Goddess?"

"What energy?"

"The energy the bat and ball became, Goddess."

"Oh, you mean that silly little thing you call 'The Law of Conservation of Matter and Energy'? Are you really so naive as to think that I would be bound by such a petty restriction? No, the matter for the bat existed in no form whatsoever before I created it, and the matter of which both the bat and ball were made now exists in no form at all.

"You." She gestured to one of the doctors. "Flick the light switch."

The doctor did so. Everyone but the Goddess gasped as the light bulb clearly went dark, but the room itself continued to be illuminated, with darkness slowly creeping from the bulb.

"What is this?"

"'What is this, Goddess.'"

"What is this, Goddess?"

"This? This is nothing more than simply slowing down the speed of light in this room. It is currently traveling at one millimetre per second. Go, walk around. I can assure you nothing will happen to you for doing that."

With extreme trepidation the scientists, doctors and brass began moving about, amazed they were violating many of the most basic laws of physics as they understood them.

"Now," said the Goddess as she restored the speed of light to normal but created illumination out of what seemed to the pathetic mortals around Her to be nowhere, "I shall leave you with a few parting words. Don't bother trying to tell anyone about Me. I don't want you to, so you can't. Don't bother trying to recreate the formula. It can't be done, I've seen to that. Don't bother trying to find any other way of giving someone power. That can't be done either. Don't bother trying to oppose me in any way. You won't succeed, not even in the slightest. And don't think that things have changed. They haven't. It has always been this way. It will always be this way. I will always be the Goddess. I always have been the Goddess. I am the Goddess."

Then the Goddess, never having been First Lieutenant Pamela Smith, She who is the creator of the universe and every universe before and after it, vanished.

"Do you want us to set you up a testing ground for your new powers?" asked the General.

"That won't be necessary... Mark," said the new Goddess. "I am fully in control of my infinite abilities as the eternal, omnipotent, unchallengeable ruler of the universe. Nothing anyone or anything can possibly do can be of the slightest significance to me." As Pvt. Lee said each word, they became true. No testing would be necessary. The General's name, previously Chris, was now, as far as anyone but the Goddess knew, Mark. She came into full control of her abilities the instant she claimed she was, and while she was already immortal and omnipotent, claiming unchallengeability ensured that nobody else could gain power like hers unless she wanted them to. Her final claims cemented her position as absolute ruler of reality, able to do anything without any possible opposition whatsoever.

"Private Lee!" spluttered the General, "you will address your sup--"

"No, Mark. You will address your superior as Goddess."

"I don't believe this! This is--"

"This is what? This is how it always will be, Mark. I am the only thing that matters, and reality is my plaything. Your belief, or lack thereof, is of no consequence whatsoever."

The General turned to the doctor. "Bill, isn't there something--anything--we can do?"

Bill was about to reply when the Goddess cut in. "No, there's nothing you can do. Didn't you hear me the first time? Nothing you do is of any significance to me at all. You can't remove my powers, you can't give anyone else my powers. You can't kill me--hell, you can't hurt me, knock me unconscious, anything. I can change physical laws at my whim and you think you can do anything to me? I can rewrite history however I want and you think you matter to me? Whatever deities you believe in are powerless, impotent wimps compared to me. You are less to me than a centipede is to you--hell, this universe is less to me than that! Operation Apotheosis was a complete success. I'd say it's a pity you won't be able to take advantage of the results, but I couldn't care about you or your petty concerns. Only one thing in this universe matters now--me. What you want doesn't matter. If I want it to happen, it will happen. If I don't want it to happen, it won't happen."

From the doctor's perspective, the General's drawing his sidearm was sudden and unexpected. From the Goddess's perspective, it was predictable and boring.

The General held the gun steady on Pvt. Lee. "How do we know you're not bluffing? How do we know you can really do what you say you can? So far you've only demonstrated enough strength to snap those restraints."

The Goddess sighed and began rewriting Mark's past. "Your name is Mark Beauchamp." Previously, it was Smith. "You have a twin sister, and no other siblings." Previously he had been the oldest of four brothers. "Your first sexual experience was on your sixteenth birthday, with that sister." Previously he had waited until the night of his high school graduation ceremony, where he and the hot valedictorian fucked all night. "You remained lovers until you went to military college, but you still fuck like bunnies whenever you go and visit her. Nobody knows, though, that you enjoy crossdressing and fantasize about being a tiny, huge-busted Vietnamese twenty-year-old whore--you've had a fetish for them ever since you raped a ton of them in 'Nam." Mark couldn't believe this. If this ever got out, he'd be court-martialed and dishonorably discharged in no time flat! "As a result of that and other exploits in later deployments, you've fathered over a hundred illegitimate children. Your sister's husband doesn't know it, but all five of her kids are yours, not his." Mark's entire life had changed--his squeaky-clean image before had been genuine, but now it covered a trail of indiscretions ten miles long.

"How do you know all this?" he asked.

"I told you. I'm the Goddess of the universe. I know everything."

The General suddenly looked uncomfortable. "So, could you, well, you know..."

"Make you the woman of your fantasies?" Suddenly standing in the room where the General used to be was a 4'6" Vietnamese woman. Her breasts were the size of watermelons, and her ass cheeks the size of coconuts; her waist seemed absurdly thin in between. Her dress, though, indicated that she was a high-class call girl. She didn't look a day over twenty. "Of course, Mai. Now, shouldn't you be with a client somewhere?" Mai vanished.

The doctor looked on in stunned disbelief. "But... but he was the impetus behind the entire project! How can you even exist if the project never happened?"

"Bill, Bill. Don't be so silly. I don't need anything to have happened to exist. I just am. Things like causality and history are of no consequence to me. The God Formula never existed, Operation Apotheosis never happened. I was never anything but the Goddess. I created the universe, I do with it as I will, I'll destroy it when I want, I'll create the next universe at my whim, and so on. But since you can't even be bothered to use what little intelligence you have, maybe you'd be better suited to a job that doesn't require it." In the next instant Mai had gained a twin sister, Trinh. They were quite popular with their agency's customers.

The Goddess looked around the empty lab. Sometimes she didn't know why she bothered intervening with the various species she'd created. Sometimes just watching the ants was as fun as kicking their hill, but generally she preferred to stick a finger in.

145331221.content:
'Thank you Kathy, you may go, the board have much to discuss and thank you for your hard work' Michelle, the CEO of the company said 'it was my pleasure Ms North' Kathy replied, she turned and left the room. 'Now that she is out of the way, we must discuss what to do with this' Michelle said, motioning to the formula 'oh please its clearly a hoax' an old male board member said 'you cant really believe it will do as she says surely?' another chimed in. 'I suppose we should adjourn then, at least until the formula can be analysed more' Michelle said rising from her seat 'I will have some of our other scientists come up to meet with me and discuss options, until then.'

The room cleared until Michelle was alone, she made her way to the formula and picked it up, then took it to her office. She closed the door and held the vial up to the light 'finally after years of work, billions spent, I have what I wanted, those fools know nothing of what I have here' Michelle said to herself. Her thoughts were interrupted by her secretary 'Ms North your children are here to see you' 'of course send them in' she replied smiling to herself. Michelle was a power hungry woman, no matter how much wealth or influence she had she always wanted more, she stood at an impressive 6 foot 5 with raven hair and emerald eyes. He three children had not inherited her lust for power but at least they had her looks.

Michelle watched as her children, a son and two daughters, entered 'hello my darlings' she smiled 'hey mom' they replied. Her son Chris was an inch taller than her and was fairly muscled, her eldest daughter Karen was the same height as her and quite muscular herself, her youngest daughter Tara was an inch shorter than her and while not quite as athletic as the other two was incredibly intelligent.

'I am about to gain more power in this world my children' Michelle said, beaming at her kids 'don't you think you have enough power mom?' Karen asked 'there is no such thing as to much power Karen' Michelle replied 'now the world, no the universe is about to become mine.' 'Uh what do you mean mom?' Chris asked 'that sounds crazy' 'maybe it does but that's irrelevant right now' Michelle said still holding the formula 'mom what's this all about?' Tara asked her 'you three will watch as I take my rightful place as the supreme goddess of everything.'

'Okay, lets say that's true, what happens to us?' Karen asked her mom 'I'm not quite sure yet' Michelle replied frankly 'I guess we'll see.' Michelle opened vial and quickly emptied it into her mouth 'mom is that safe to drink? 'Tara said 'oh its safe, its more than safe' Michelle relied as she felt the formula taking effect 'bare witness to my ascension' Michelle's eyes began to glow 'I can feel raw power coursing through me, I am omnipotent, I am God' she roared. Michelle looked to see her children backing away from her towards the door 'I didn't say you could leave' she said 'mom what's happening?' Tara said terrified 'I told you, I am God, the universe has a new mistress, but right now this world needs to see its goddess.'

There was a flash and the children of the new goddess found themselves on the sidewalk outside the office building 'what the fuck' Chris said 'where's mom?' they heard a rumbling and then booming laughter 'I think I know' Karen said as the three of them huddled together terrified of what was happening. The whole city began to shake as a massive still growing Michelle burst from the building, her laughter booming like thunder as her shadow began to cover the city. 'Oh my fucking god she's huge, mom's a fucking giant and she's still growing' Tara said staring wide eyed 'she's not stopping, how big is she going to get?' Karen screamed. As if hearing her Michelle stopped growing at a mile in height 'this will do for now I think' she boomed 'time to survey my domain, but first' she held out her hand and her children appeared in her palm.

'Now you three' Michelle said smiling down at her terrified children, they were in awe of her, they could never have imagined their mother as a colossal goddess who would hold them in her palm 'you are going to be....'

They still couldn't quite believe what they were hearing, but finally Karen finally managed to stammer 'wor...worship you? you're going to make people worship you?' Chris piped up. These questions were met with Michelle's furious gaze and her fingers curling in towards her children, they heard a low growling and grunting emanating from their mothers throat and to their horror her fingers began to tower even higher and Michelle's face was moved further away from them. 'Oh shit she's growing again' Karen screamed, holding on to her siblings terrified as their monolithic mom became even more titanic.

Michelle looked upon her children as they and the world below began to shrink before her eyes 'I am God!' she roared 'I will not be questioned by anyone, not even my children, you three should know better than anyone I expect obedience, my will is law!' the groaning from her became deeper along with her voice as she swelled even larger. 'Perhaps you would like to join the rest of the germs at my feet, maybe its where you belong, completely beneath me like everything else' she thundered as the sky filled with black clouds that seemed to spread from her body.

The three siblings cried out to their mother, begging her to stop and that they were sorry and that they would listen to her. 'Mommy we're sorry' Tara screamed 'don't hurt us 'Karen joined in. Chris was paralyzed with fear as he looked up at his still growing mother. Michelle stopped growing at three miles and studied her tiny children, clearly debating what she should do...

Michelle quelled her anger. She couldn't bring herself to harm her children, she did love them even if she sometimes didn't know how to show it.
The goddesses features softened and she apologized to her cowering offspring "I'm sorry I got angry. Don't be afraid, mom loves you so much. But I need you to do as I say, okay?""
Even with her apology she could tell they were still frightened. The ascended woman decided the best way to sooth their fears was to use her powers, and take those fears away. Michelle reached into her children's minds and made them unable to fear her. She even changed them so they were now utterly obedient.

Tara felt her fear of her mother melting away. Now all she felt was love for the gigantic goddess who had birthed her. Her siblings felt the same way. How could they have ever considered disobeying the divine perfection that was their mother? They belonged to her and needed to obey her in all things.

Michelle felt no guilt that she'd basically brainwashed her own children. She loved them and she knew what was best for them.
"Isn't that better my darlings?" the immoral goddess boomed. She smiled lovingly at them when they responded by singing her praises.
"Time for you to go in your new home now.." she said and created a jeweled necklace.

Her three children found themselves transported inside the gem around their mothers neck. They gasped as they looked around. It was beautiful. A paradise had been created inside the necklace, just for them, and contained everything they could ever want or need. They were especially grateful that they would always be close to their moms heart no matter where she went.

The goddess felt the love from her children as they thanked her for giving them such a perfect gift. She'd made them immortal and unchanging, they would always be with her now. Forever. Subjugation

The rest of the world would not be as fortunate as Michelle's kids. She had no intention of altering anyone else's minds to make them obey her. The goddess wanted humanity to fear her, she wanted to taste their terror as she ground their wills to resist her into the dirt.


Mortals below screamed as a huge foot tore through what was left of Michelle's company building. She used her divine powers to remove everyone and everything connected to the formula from existence, ensuring no one could ever challenge her.
The goddess grew herself until she could cover the entire city with one toe. She relished the screams of her mortal slaves as she pressed down with her big toe, obliterating all beneath it. As far as she was concerned her might made her right and, no matter how cruel or how many she killed, she was doing nothing wrong.

Janice looked at the container for a moment "Ah, you can keep it. It is probably some kind of worthless shit, you can keep it" and she waved her hand dismissively. Amber looked at the container itself "Well alright then, at least we got some other equipment. I will see you in the morning and keep watch of the news, don't want to have the heat on us, good night" and Amber walked off to her own car and drove back to her apartment.

Half an hour later she arrived at her apartment, placed the container down on her bedside table and feeling very tired she slept. She woke up in the morning and grabbed the container, unfastening it by placing it under hot water and hitting it with a hammer until the lid finally came loose. She then looked inside and noticed it was a strange liquid inside. She placed her nose close to it and it seemed to smell like soup. She laughed to herself someone tried to keep their inside a safe. She then poured the 'Soup' into a cup and then sat down on her couch.

Amber now switched on the TV with her remote, changing channels to the news, she almost dropped the cup when she heard the announcer "Today Police have arrested a woman named Janice and charged her with burglary of expensive equipment at a laboratory, police are still looking for her accomplice that was also viewed in security camera footage". Amber while shocked decided to drink some of the soup, idly sipping away at it as she gleaned more information on the police efforts to track her down.

Suddenly she felt strangely euphoric, like a rush of some kind. Instantly she was aware it had something to do with the 'Soup' she drunk. The universe, omnipotence, omniscience, all became clear in a sudden burst of revelation. But then something else became clear.

An untested formula was an untested formula. Regardless of whatever your research had lead you to believe. How had you even determined that this stuff would make you a god anyway? Now that you thought about it, what had really gone into it. It felt like you couldn't remember. Perhaps as soon as you downed this mouthful of home made pepsi, you would visit a head doctor and determine exactly what in the world was wrong with you.

You lift the jar to your mouth, staring at it a moment before tilting your head back. The taste is foul, and stings your tongue with the kind of power a sour candy would possess. You stand still, hoping against hope......

Nothing. After a few minutes you sigh, turning towards the door. Then it hits you like a ton of bricks. your hair stands on end, electricity seeming to run through you. You let a bellow of surprise resound through the room as you are ripped from the floor. You fly higher and higher into the air, images racing through your mind. Your home town, your state, the US, north america, the planet, the solar system, the galaxy, your view continues to sweep until you observe the universe as a whole, a small pin prick of light in a black vastness. More voices than you can count suddenly well up in your head, some louder than others. All scream at you. Of needs, of injustices, of wants. All of existence seems to call out to you, it's new master. The sheer scope of it shakes you to your core, you can't help but feel a bit over whelmed. You focus your mind, bringing your view back to the planet earth. This would have to do for now.

You awaken on the floor, groaning as you sit up. Your head hurts, but there is no sign of physical trauma from falling from the ceiling. That charged feeling still runs through your body. You feel invincible as soon as you get on your feet. What you saw was the first of many powers. Omnipotence. What you've just seen has inspired you...

"Hey Jordan! How are you?" you say to the friendly and helpful teen.

"Hi Miss Weiss. What... What are you doing here at my school?" the boy wondered.

"I have something to give you. Look..." you say as you pull out the plastic container.

"Great!" you reply. "You'll get half of the God-powers from the formula, which means I can give you the other half since I possess them. Then you'll have a complete set of God-powers and you'll be completely omnipotent!"

"Whoa... WHOA!" Jordan moaned softly as he began to feel all the power of all the stars, the planets, the galaxies and universes pour into his body! His shoes started to lift off the ground by a few inches as the boy transformed into... God!

"Holy shit! I... I'm omnipotent!" Jordan exclaimed, as his body was glowing a blue aura.

You just look up to the Godly boy with a grin.

"Yes! I don't have to bear the responsibility anymore! It's all yours now!" you sigh. "You can do anything!"

"Wow! Thank you, Miss Weiss!" Jordan said, as his tennis shoes slowly landed on the floor.

"Well, have fun with your new powers!" you say to the boy. "Can I ask you a small favor?"

"Sure!"

"Can you teleport me back to my lab?"

Jordan waved his hand and I was instantly standing in my lab holding an empty container for a formula which would never be created again.
