1533311122121112222122212111122222.title: You don't interfere.

15333111221211122221222121111222221.content:
"well..." Jenna said, glancing up at the airborne Lita. "I'd say she definitely drank the formula.....What kind of power do you think she got?"

"Turning into that...thing is my guess." Amy responded, letting electricity surge around her hands. Screams rang out as the few students in the area made a run for it. Amy makes a motion with her hand, sending lightning sailing through the air. Lita's eyes turn in that direction, body running on auto pilot thanks to a bit of meddling on your part. She beats her wings, moving out of the way of the lightning with surprising speed. With another movement of those wings, she spirals through the air, diving at Amy, hands balled into fists tightly.
15333111221211122221222121111222221.title: Amy attacks first

choices: She finds Lita has been knocked out
153331112212111222212221211112222211.content: And with a loud crack Lita landed a direct hit as she and Amy were sent sprawling across the ground. Amy however slammed her fist into Lita's gut, sending a massive electrical surge into her and momentarily stunned by the shock she was instantly thrown against a brick wall, creating a major dent in the shape of her wings and body as her body fell limp inside the building. As Amy casually strutted towards the building
153331112212111222212221211112222211.title: Direct Hit

choices: Amy takes her back to Jenna
1533311122121112222122212111122222111.content:
Amy sauntered through the wall, ducking through the lita shaped hole. On the other side a few students were still scurrying away. It appeared to be a class room. Laying amongst a pile of broken desks, was the demonic goth. She was breathing, but her eyes were shut. A bit of smoke was raising off of her from Amys attack.

"Guess you weren't up too much!" Amy laughed, crossing the room before stopping over the demonic goth. "Now what to do with you?"
1533311122121112222122212111122222111.title: She finds Lita has been knocked out

choices: Amy fires off one last attack.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112.content: Amys confident walk stops suddenly as she's blown off her feet, Lita having erupted through another part of the wall and struck the lightning users face. The demonic goth spun in the air, changing direction while maintaining momentum. She passed Amy at high speed, wrapping one hand around her throat before changing the angle of flight. Amy crashed into the ground, Lita using her as a brake before beating her wings to take to the sky again.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112.title: Lita suddenly counterattacks!

15333111221211122221222121111222221121.content:
Jenna bears her teeth, growling slightly as she's surrounded by a faint blue light. Suddenly she erupts into the air, increasing in size and proportion. Lita turns in the air, still beating her wings to stay aloft as a shadow is cast over her. When she'd willed it to stop, Jenna stood 60 feet tall. Her arm lashed out, fast enough to catch Lita by surprise. Jennas hand wrapped around lita, tightly binding the goth in her grip.

"Two's company. Three's a crowd." Jenna explains, moving her hand....
15333111221211122221222121111222221121.title: Jenna makes a move

15333111221211122221222121111222221122.content:
Amy came to the realization quickly that she wouldn't be in this fight much longer. Her vision was blurring and swimming. Her breath was shallow and she KNEW she had broken ribs. She couldn't be sure of what damage she'd just taken, but from the look of the CRATER the demonic girl had left her in, it was bad.

"Stupid bitch!" Amy shouted, heart pumping from a lack of oxygen. Attempts to move her right arm sent pain surging through her. After five attempts, Amy took the hint and raised her left. Her arm was shaking uncontrollably. Electricity surged around her hand, Amy doing her best to keep her arm steady. Finally, she fired, unleashing a massive bolt of lightning that streaked into the sky....but missed Lita by a few feet. "Dammit..." Amy mutters, closing her eyes and going limp.
15333111221211122221222121111222221122.title: Amy fires off one last attack.

choices: Lita manages to break it with a punch
The boulder pushes the air out of lita, knocking her out, but doesn't kill her.
153331112212111222212221211112222211221.content:
Jenna looked to the ground, quickly. It was her turn. She grabbed a handful of pebbles, thinking about this for a moment before hurling one at Lita. Blue light surrounded the pebble as it moved, suddenly increasing in size until it was a boulder. Lita spun in the direction of the on coming rock, taking the massive boulder directly. The demonic goth fell to the ground, rock pinning her there.

Jenna smirked, dropping the rest of the rocks as she began to increase the size of the boulder pinning Lita to the ground.
153331112212111222212221211112222211221.title: Jenna makes a move.

153331112212111222212221211112222211222.content:
Jenna bites one of her lips, realizing this is a bad situation. Amys power was actually GEARED towards destruction. With her own power, she'd likely never catch a micro sized demon girl. Making Lita larger would just be stupid.

The thought never occured to Jenna to make herself larger and try and crush Lita. Instead, she turned, running to her car, and climbing in. The engine started, Lita watching as the car began to pull away.

She...
153331112212111222212221211112222211222.title: Jenna decides to leave.

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
As Jenna drove away she thought that Lita would come back, but as she drove on-- nothing. She had to hide somewhere and figure out how to beat her.

Lita watched as Jenna pulled away, deciding not to peruse. After all, she had Amy to finish with. Stepping towards her and looking over her unconscious form, does she
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Let's Jenna go

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
Lita scoffs loudly, turning away from the crater. She made it back to the buildings entrance before collapsing. Her life no longer being in any danger had caused her to revert to her normal human appearance. With a thought you quickly reform the clothes lita had been wearing before transforming. You walk down the sidewalk, purposefully slowing down as you pass the crater. A motion of your hands drains Amys cosmic awareness, leaving her as nothing better than a human lightning rod.

"When you're ready to try acting like an adult, come see me." You say before leaving the scene behind. You appear at the apex of a large building, watching a white car speed down a street.

Well...you could probably let her go for now...
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Let her go

choices: She quickly tries to run the red light
She asks what you want from her
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content: Jenna was still dangerous and Lita was still not quite aware of just how dangerous, no doubt Jenna would learn of her size changing power and tear up half the city to get Lita. You quickly approached the white car as it approached a red light and Jenna looked in surprise in seeing you again after she thought you died
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Go after her.

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content: Quickly releasing what you must be she panicked and floored the accelerator, driving past the stop light into the oncoming traffic in her bid to escape
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Road rule violation

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
Jenna held it together well, keeping the car going a normal speed as she headed for home. "So...it was you after all." She said finally. You shrug in response, staring out the windshield.

"Who knows?" You ask finally, looking to Jenna.

The drive continues in silence, Jenna doing her best to keep calm with an omnipotent being sitting beside her. Finally she looks over to you and opens her mouth.

"What do you want?"She asks finally.

Again you shrug. "Does anyone else have the formula?" you ask on a whim.

Jenna sits in silence for a moment, looking in your direction after she guides the car around the corner. "There might be some higher ups, but like me, they would have had a drop AT most. We didn't want to drink larger amounts of an untested formula."

You nod, acknowledging the fact you have a greater threat to take care of.

"Is that really all you wanted?" Jenna asks, glancing to you as the car stops at a red light.

You shrug again.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: She asks what you want from her

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
"No, I DID come here for you." You reply.

The supervisor slams on the brakes, causing you to slam into the dashboard head first. A brief moment of pain flashes across your mind as you right yourself.

Who makes the first move?
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: "No, I came for you."

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content: With rapid thinking she quickly unhooked her seat belt and dashed from the vehicle, as you try to recover from the pain you suddenly realised she took this opportunity to use her growth power, she was now over a hundred feet tall and as your awareness returned you realised that in a moment you
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: The supervisor

choices: No, this stupid bitch needs to be put in her place now
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content: But she couldn't outmanoeuvre God. As the car was smashed underneath her shoe she laughed in triumph, boasting loudly and arrogantly as she stood over the wreckage "You might be a God but you still have a mortal body!" and further ground her heel. You realised with amusement that she was so stupid that she didn't even remember the lesson on the last time she tried to kill you. Do you let her think she won?
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: In the nick of time

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
"RELAX!" You shout as the supervisor makes a wild attempt to unbuckle her seat belt. Thunder claps in response to your anger, rattling the windows of the car. "I don't mean it the way you think I do!"

You make a motion with your hand, causing similar green whisps of light to the ones you got from Amy to flee Jenna's body. Her cosmic awareness and powers drained away at your command. Once you had it all you balled your hand tightly into a fist, opening the door without physically interacting with it.

"That's all I needed. Don't get caught up in this again.....I won't be so nice a second time." Just as quickly as you'd arrived, you vanished. Appearing once more on top of the tallest building in the city. You unballed both of your hands, finally. In the palm of each hand appeared to be a ball of swirling green light.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: You

choices: Your cosmically aware mind wanders once more.
You focus your awareness, checking out the directors.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You close your hands again, smiling at the distance. Life had taken an interesting turn today. One you didn't really find all that annoying. With a thought, a sheet of paper appears infront of you, the formula written upon it. You snap, setting the paper ablaze. You'd play along with this game life has presented you. So long as they couldn't ingest more than a drop of the formula, the board of directors wouldn't be any problem. With another thought, a paper detailing the information of these so called Directors appears in your hand. A group of eight. Three male, five female.

None of them were rich, famous, or extraordinarily intelligent. They'd simply been placed in control of the facility by the CEO. This could make for a downright interesting game...

You move your hand, the papers appearing in your room at home. You look down below, once more. Jennas car has gone. With a sigh, you turn, heading to home and calling it a day.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Call it a day

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
Your mind focused, what sort of powers did the God Formula give them anyway? They didn't drink much as it was untested but you did. You thought for a second on an interesting thought, what if someone drank it all? Would you even be able to know? They could be manipulating events for their own amusement. You pushed such a silly thought from your head, you needed to focus.

The first director, Cynthia had the power of mind control. She made her subordinates do whatever she told them to. It wouldn't work on you, but everyone around her would be under her spell. Maybe you could pretend to be enslaved by her. Or maybe just go straight to removing her power

The second director, Alex had the ability of telekinesis. He could throw massive objects around, he might be quite a handful to contain if you got close.

So which director do you look deeper into first?
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigating the Directors

choices: Be cautious, look into the others first.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You decide to investigate Cynthia, the world slowly beginning to move. It stop again with a bit of focus, however. A thought had crossed your mind.

You really were better off checking into the directors once you knew all about them as a whole. Knowing that Alex used telekinesis or that Cynthia had the ability to sway the wills of men was great, but the others could show up. Even without a body you didn't want to be caught off guard....
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Maybe not.

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
This was probably for the best, anyway. You focus a bit, several flashes of alternate timelines giving you the info you needed.

William Bernstein, one of the three male directors, had the power to distort space. Through such he could perform acts of teleportation, and spatial manipulation such as "folding" an area in on itself. A mostly harmless power, unless he figured out how to use it properly.

Nina Meroux, one of the five female directors, possessed the power of reconstruction. A devastating ability to take anything apart at the molecular level. While this would normally be followed with re-arranging the molecules in any way she saw fit to create objects or recreate something in a way more suited to the user, you can see she'd already punished some random bystanders with it. Dangerous.

Micheal Smith, possessed of the power of immortality. Nothing would be able to injure or kill him.

Jessica Blake. She held the power of Geomancy, an ability to move anything made of stone at will.

Alisa Tartakovsky, her ability, for all that you could see, seemed to be the nullification of cosmic awareness in anything she touched, the source of their powers as well as yours. Extremely dangerous.

Maria Baxter. Hers was the power of unification. An ability similar to the one you'd used to merge Lita and Mindy. She absorbed the target into her body, combined their strengths with hers, and was much stronger for it. Like Alisa, she needed to touch a target for it to work. Stay out of her way...

With this new information you make your choice...
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Be cautious, look into the others first.

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
Cynthia was a good place to start. Her power would be useless against you. Not that she would know you were there. The world moved, faster than it had the previous night. You move cross country in seconds, passing through the wall of a tall building.

On the other side you find yourself in a decently sized room. Larger than your apartment for sure. The decoration was reserved, a lot of wood furniture. With your god like power you knew it to be mahogany the moment you laid eyes on it. Sitting behind a desk was a short, fair skinned woman. Her hair was black and short, barely reaching the base of her neck. The suit she wore did nothing to make her look attractive. The thick rimmed glasses that adorned her face reflected some of the light from the offices lamps. She was working on a report of some sort, penning furiously to make sure she'd meet her dead line. Across the room, several employees were penning just as fast as she was. You knew they weren't doing so by choice....

Information began to flood into your mind as you looked her over. Another power, perhaps. You HAD been focusing on getting information about these people. She, unlike most of the others, had climbed the corporate ladder with nothing but hard work. This had taken a large portion of her life and she regretted it immensely despite her success. This stemmed, it seemed, from a lack of respect from those around her. While she was arguably the most qualified to be a director, the others still treated her like the lower level employees. Her first use of that mind control had been to get some respect out of the staff, who'd followed in the other directors foot steps when dealing with her. None of the others knew her power was truly mind control, however. She'd simply told them she inspired fear in people. Fears, thoughts, and desires skimmed across your mind. You were indeed learning everything about Cynthia Zuckerberg. Most importantly, though, her ultimate use of the formula, should she ever gain enough of it to become a god. She would undo her past, set her life down a completely different path. Undoing everything that had happened.

She wasn't a bad person, but she had the beginnings of a tyrant in her. The will power to use her ability to get what she wanted....
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Cynthia Zuckerberg.

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You drift back through the wall, leaving Cynthia to her work. The country flies beneath you again, sun beginning to fully set as you pass through a few states in a matter of seconds. You swerve suddenly, angling towards the ground. Under you is a resteraunt of some sort, you're not sure what type since you can't see the sign. You pass through the roof, stopping at a table in the corner. A tall Caucasian man in a fancy looking suit is eating dinner with a lovely looking young lady. The age difference between them was only 9 years. As the information began to slide into your head, you decide this is Alex Sands.

The woman he was with was NOT his wife, or even his girlfriend. She was a reporter for a national paper, and wanted to do a piece on corruption in the company that owned the lab you worked in. He'd shot her down many times over the last week, finally relenting and offering her the interview over dinner. She gladly accepted.

She might have been imagining something different, however. So far all their banter had nothing to do with the company. Any questions about it she asked were dodged outright. The plate infront of her looked as though it hadn't been touched, whilst Alex was, perhaps, OVER ENJOYING his pasta.

"What's the matter, Ms.Lark? Is the food not to your liking?" Alex asked finally. A smirk crossed his face, one you took note of. He'd climbed the ladder quickly through referrals from other high ranking people. He'd put virtually no work into anything. This had left him considering other people as playthings. Toys to be used until they grew boring.

"Mr.Sands, when you agreed to this interview I was under the impression I'd finally be getting some answers. But I find you're still dodging the questions." the reporter complained, placing her fork on her plate and twisting it around.

"What's the rush?" Alex asked, raising one of his fingers as he rested his head in his free hand. You note the faintest bit of light around that finger. "You need to relax every once and a while. You might find you'll have.... a good time." Alex moved his finger at the end of his sentence. The reporter jumped suddenly, gasping. She looks around before looking back to her plate. You note her fidgeting in place ever so slightly. "I honestly don't intend to answer any of those questions." Alex admitted, placing his finger on the table and poking at the table cloth. The reporter grabbed the table, clamping her hands down on it as her breathing began to become heavy. She was visibly trying to keep her mouth shut, face flushing red.

You think you've seen enough...
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Alex Sands

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You move again, this time finding yourself in a place you recognize. The lab. An average sized woman, dressed in a ridiculously fancy black dress with a slit down one side, sat in your cubicle. She was tearing your desk apart, you had an idea what she was looking for. The plan for the formula, the key to making more without starting over from scratch. She'd find none of it, unfortunately. The information began to flood your mind.

She'd used sex appeal and sex itself to climb the corporate ladder. Much like Alex, she considered people play things, only they couldn't stand each other. Her goal for the formula, should she ever hold enough to make her that powerful, was domination of the world. To be the most powerful thing in the galaxy simply to have her fun with it. While that was the choice you had made as well, you didn't have anything in particular in mind when you'd made it. She had already decided on destroying the earth and moving on from there.

"WHERE IS IT!?" She screamed furiously as she tossed papers onto the floor. You could tell she was used to getting her way and DID NOT like being held back when it came to things she wanted. Finally, in fury, she placed her hand on your desk. The wooden desk, and everything upon it, look like it were being shredded. When it was over Nina was holding her hand in the air. No trace of your desk remained.

"That bastard, if I ever find him..." She mumbled to herself as she began to walk off.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Nina Meroux

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
The scene shifts again, this time you find yourself in a small apartment. For all her success, Alisa didn't live the big life. Most of her money was in a savings account that belonged to her younger siblings. Sitting in a plain looking chair beside a PC was an average sized, frail looking, girl. She was buxom and skinny, knee length blonde hair done up in a ponytail that draped over the chair behind her. The youngest of the directors to be certain. But the looks hid the truth. While the youngest, she was the most determined. Will power was in no shortage for her. She'd cared for her siblings from a young age after their parents had died in a car accident. Paid her way through school. Started in the mail room at the head office in New mexico before working her way up to where she was now in only 2 short years. She was talented and driven, there was no doubt about that.

You are surprised to find she had no plans whatsoever for the god formula. She'd only drunk the drop she'd taken to see if it was completed or not. As far as she was concerned, no one had the right to be so powerful. This may have had a hand in the form her power took. Nullification. There had been another employee who'd taken a drop like the director had, the one who'd brought it to them. Alisa had completely removed her powers with a single touch.

It was clear to you this woman was someone you wouldn't have to worry about.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Alisa Tartakovsky

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You move again, finding yourself in some bar. Dancing around with a crowd of people was the man in question. At least, you thought it was him. He looked far too happy and not creepy. You might even say he was good looking. A strong jaw, shoulder length black hair, decently built, too.

The information began to arrive. William Bernstein had earned his promotion, but with less effort than Cynthia or Alisa. He was used to being the go to guy for the others. A dependable person they could count on; It drove him insane. The buck was always passed to him. When something needed taken care of, he was the one made responsible. While he looked happy dancing with that crowd, you could almost feel the hate rolling off of him. He hated people. All of them. A man who absolutely shouldn't have the god formula no matter what. He danced his small crowd to the other side of the room, where no one but you was paying attention. A...hole, or something to that effect, opened under their feet, William and his consorts falling into it. A brief moment later he came out of the bathroom.

"I'll save them for later." He said to himself as he headed towards the door.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: William Bernstein

1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
Yet another movement. You find yourself in another office, this one smaller and smelling of wood like the previous ones. Behind a desk sat an old man. He appeared to be in his late 60's, most people would have retired by now. But not him. He'd spend his whole life working here. Micheal smith's father had helped create the company. He'd been groomed from an early age to inherit the position of director. He feared the end of his life, having no heir of his own to continue the family legacy. When the god formula was brought to his attention, he wished for one thing and one thing only. Immortality. A body that was invulnerable to both age and death. A single drop had granted him that dream. The smith family legacy would live on, even if any of the yahoos he was forced to work with figured out how to make the formula and finished it.

the old man poses no threat, and seems to want only to keep his blood line going. It could be worse, right?
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Micheal Smith

choices: Move on to the next target
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content: Again you shifted yourself into an outdoor area, Maria Baxter was walking through a crowd. A glance into her history revealed that her rise to director was due to her innovative use of synergy. Merging the departments or their practices with one another to increase efficiency, she most definitely seemed to earn her promotion. However her obsession with combining and merging everything was taking a toll on her mental stability, with the drop of the formula it only became worse as it was revealed to you that she started merging with people that she considered smart and talented to acquire their intelligence and strengths. Not only did this cause them to disappear but you realised that she was remarkably and dangerously intelligent and believed herself to be a superhuman. Already she must be staking out the crowd for another target to merge with, she spots the city mayor on a stage, planning to absorb his charismatic charm.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Maria Baxter

choices: Begin taking them out one by one.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
In another flash you find yourself in a wide room. Various stones, gems, and jewels line the walls. Sitting at a small desk in the center was the last director. Jessica Blake had always admired the beauty of things that came out of the earths bowels. Their strength was nothing to scoff at. The hardest material available on earth was found below the earths crust. She'd originally been in charge of another facet of the company that supplied gems to jewelers. Eventually she was promoted simply because she was the last qualified person to take a director position. She knew nothing about the sciences your lab studied. Nor did she care. At least, she didn't care UNTIL the god formula was presented to her.

With power like that she could gather every gem in the world for herself. She harbored no ill will towards humanity, she just desired everything they considered of value. Her ability centered around the manipulation of anything she considered "stone.". A power that could prove dangerous, if she figured out how to use it properly.

With this last bit of information, the world shifts again. You appear in your apartment, though you're still incorporeal. Now was the time to decide what to do with them...
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Investigation: Jessica Blake

choices: Make them fight against people you choose for the formula.
Make them fight in a tournament style setting.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content: Yes, having some fun with this would be for the best. You hadn't bothered looking into these people just to destroy them with a thought. You should make it much more grand than that! You ponder your options on just how to do that...
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Have some fun with it.

choices: Who cares, you can always just restore people to life.
make SOME attempt to protect humanity.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You'd played too many fighting games in your life. A tournament style set up, against people you'd choose. Not all of the directors were heartless douchecakes, though. Perhaps some form of reward was in order. The sun begins to rise outside, in response you return your consciousness to your mortal body.

You rise, stretch, and begin thinking things out further as you dress yourself. A battle like that could become a problem, though. The fighting could easily spill out into public view and cause casualties.

You place a hand to your chin, scratching whilst you think.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.title: Make them fight in a tournament style setting.

choices: They agree to play by your rules.
They attempt to defeat you here.
1533311122121112222122212111122222112221.content:
You could always set the fight somewhere where there wouldn't be any people.

You finish dressing yourself. You'd chosen a nice presentable looking suit. If only because of the company you'd keep today. A few hours had passed since you'd woken up. This passage of time had been important. It was monday morning, 7 AM. ALL the directors would be gathered in one spot today. You focus your mind, space warping around you.

In a flash of light that you made on purpose you appear at the head of a circular room. The curtains were drawn, lights off. A projector to your side was currently showing a few slides and such. Your attention, however, is focused on the 8 individuals sitting behind a large round wooden table.

Some raise eyebrows, a few stand up, two of them remained seated as though this didn't surprise them. There's a sudden scramble of feet. Nina dashing your way as her chair falls to the ground. You wave your hand, causing her to stop completely in her tracks. Her arm is outstretched, hand open and only a few inches away from you.

"Bastard..." she managed to mumble, clearly struggling to get closer to you.

"Good morning, ladies and gents." You say as you step around Nina. She remained frozen in place and ranting at you with bated breath. "I'm sure you all know who I am, or at least, have a good idea based on my display just now."

A collective nod met your gaze. The directors were all clearly on edge. "To what do we owe this pleasure?" Alex asked, attempting to look as serious as possible. You're sure he intends to try and throw you out a window in a moment.

"It's hardly a pleasure. I've revealed myself to you people because I've been watching you. I know what you've been doing....what you CAN do." You begin walking around the table, looking each of the directors in the eye. Making sure they know what YOU can do. "I've come to present some options to you folks." you explain before making a motion with your hand. A thick piece of paper appears infront of each of the directors. Each one outlined your plans for a "divine battle".
